entity.name: Sumerian - Dumuzi
entity.subtitle: The Dying and Rising God,Shepherd of the People
entity.description: Dumuzi is the shepherd god of fertility and vegetation, consort of Inanna. He is the ORIGINAL dying and rising godâ€”his annual death and resurrection predate and influence Osiris, Adonis, Attis, and arguably Christ. His descent to the underworld as Inanna's substitute and his sister's sacrifice to share his fate explain the seasonal cycle: his death brings winter, his return brings spring. His name means "True Son."

relationships.enemies: Enkimdu(farmer god who competed forInanna's love;Dumuziwon)

family.consorts: Inanna(who condemned him but also mourned him)
